channel.title: Compiler and xp rate
channel.description:
Ok so i want to change the xp rate for melee and rage and mage ofc on npcs. Im using pja (project annihilation).
also the compiler doesnt work that comes with pja.
The compiler says this:
set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17 C:\apache-ant-1.7.1\bin\ant -buildfile .\build.xml @echo pause
when i compile is says this
C:\Users\Marc\Downloads\PJA_Up_To_Date_5_\PJA Up To Date(5)>set JAVA_HOME=C:\Pro gram Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17
C:\Users\Marc\Downloads\PJA_Up_To_Date_5_\PJA Up To Date(5)>C:\apache-ant-1.7.1\ bin\ant -buildfile .\build.xml The system cannot find the path specified. ECHO is on.
C:\Users\Marc\Downloads\PJA_Up_To_Date_5_\PJA Up To Date(5)>pause Press any key to continue . . .

item.title: Compiler and xp rate
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

Ok so i want to change the xp rate for melee and rage and mage ofc on npcs. Im using pja (project annihilation).

also the compiler doesnt work that comes with pja.

The compiler says this:

set JAVA_HOME=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17
C:\apache-ant-1.7.1\bin\ant -buildfile .\build.xml
@echo
pause

gram Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_17
